alert.note: Alert for Delaware Beaches (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued May 13 at 3:46PM EDT until May 14 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...The coastal communities of Delaware and New Jersey. * WHEN...Until noon on Saturday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of dense fog are expected into early evening, with the dense fog becoming more widespread tonight.
info.instruction: Use extra caution if driving. Use your headlights and be sure to leave plenty of distance between your vehicle and the one ahead of you.
